visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly rainfall data. Custom colors should be used for the chart, and additional configurations should include disabling the legend and credits.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The x-axis displays month categories with labels styled in a dark gray color and a font size of 12px. The y-axis is titled 'Rainfall (mm)' with a red color and a font size of 14px, and its labels are also styled in dark gray with a font size of 12px. The chart uses a custom color, green (#008000), for the data series representing monthly rainfall. The legend and credits are disabled to provide a cleaner visual appearance. The data series includes the monthly rainfall values, which are plotted as a spline.
